name: Archives of Corruption: Book 4 - Assembly Sanctuary
name_original: Archives of Corruption: Book 4 - Assembly Sanctuary
description:
You may also find the rest of my games on my Patreon, where you can play them all for a one-time pledge of $15 CAD

----

Book 4!

One day, the sun starts to transform humans into horny monsters. You're stuck inside a claustrophobic, abandoned factory, trying to find some way to protect yourself from the corruption outside...or perhaps, you can find a way to control it?

This is sort of a "return to form" being like a sector in Shifter Labs, with a self-contained open environment to explore. It has 8 transformations and a normal and secret "true" ending.

---------

Deep beneath the soil of the expanse known as the Outlands, a twisting library coils in its depths. Wrapping around in impossible hallways that expand in all directions, forever holding a full, unlimited catalogue of knowledge from every corner of the multiverse. Detailed descriptions of every birth, event, death, and tragedy of every reality.

Reality graces humans with little, and yet, in a hushed dark corner of the library, along with the hand of The Librarian, there are stories of humans who have survived unknowable corruption.

These are their stories.

Archive of Corruption is a series of short, experimental games that feature a small, easy-to-swallow story, featuring things to transform into and endings to find in each. You can expect these games to release very often. I aim to publish these games once a week
